titleStmt.title: A recovery from apostacy Set out in a sermon preached in Stepny Church neere London at the receiving of a penitent renegado into the Church, Octob. 21. 1638. By William Gouge D.D. and min. in Black-Friers London Herein is the history of the surprizall and admirable escape of the said penitent.
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller, for Ioshua Kirton, and Thomas Warren, at their shop in Pau's [sic] Church-yard, at the white Horse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shop in Pau's [sic] Church-yard, at the white Horse
